summary: The diff does not add the required new Motoko module under `backend/` and instead only modifies `project_state.json`, which is not part of the requested backend no-op module change.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a new Motoko source file under `backend/` containing a minimal, side-effect-free `module { ... }` (not an actor), without modifying `backend/main.mo`, and without changing canister behavior/state/interface.
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added under `backend/` (Added: 0). The only change is to `project_state.json`, and there is no evidence of a new Motoko module file or any backend directory changes. While `backend/main.mo` was not modified, the core requirement (adding a new backend Motoko module file) is not implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking content describing resumable chunked-upload system plans (500KB chunks) and assistant interaction policy, despite the BuildRequest explicitly stating chunked/resumable upload APIs and frontend changes are non-goals for this step.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to adding a no-op backend Motoko module file; the diff modifies `project_state.json` with summaries and requests about chunked uploads and interaction policy not requested as part of REQ-1 implementation.
evidence: project_state.json: summary mentions "implementing a resumable chunked-upload system" and "standardizing on 500KB chunks"
project_state.json: new_feature_requests AR-1/AR-2/AR-3 describe chunked-upload backend/frontend and pros/cons recommendation behavior
BuildRequest Non-goals: "Implementing chunked upload/resumable upload backend APIs" and "Any frontend changes"
